00019 typedef struct _loaded_lib {

00021         char (*type_name)[];
00022         lib_handle h;
00023 
00024 } loaded_lib;

00026 int __drivers_initialized = 0;
00027 
00028 
00029 /**
00030  * Contains the list of loaded libraries
00031  */
00032 loaded_lib __loaded_libs[DRIVERS_MAX_LIBS];

00049 /**
00050  * This functions handles the loading (if not already)
00051  * of the dynamic library associated with a given
00052  * phidget type
00053  */
00054 void drivers_handle_type(       char (*type_name)[],
00055                                                         litm_bus message_bus_id,
00056                                                         litm_bus system_bus_id ) {
00057 
00058         //low frequency enough
00059         __drivers_init();
00060 
00061         lib_handle lh=NULL;
00062 
00063         lh = __drivers_search_type( type_name );
00064         if (NULL!=lh) {
00065                 //already loaded
00066                 return;
00067         }
00068 
00069         __drivers_load_lib( type_name );
00070 
00071 }//
00072 
00073 void __drivers_init(void) {
00074 
00075         if (0==__drivers_initialized) {
00076                 __drivers_initialized = 1;
00077 
00078                 int i;
00079                 for (i=0;i<DRIVERS_MAX_LIBS;i++) {
00080                         __loaded_libs[i].type_name = NULL;
00081                         __loaded_libs[i].h = NULL;
00082                 }
00083 
00084         }
00085 }//
00086 
00087 /**
00088  * Loads & Inits a library
00089  */
00090 void __drivers_load_lib(char (*type_name)[]) {
00091 
00092 
00093 }//
00094 
00095 
00096 /**
00097  * Searches for a lib associated with a type
00098  *
00099  * @return lib_handle or NULL
00100  */
00101 lib_handle __drivers_search_type(char (*type_name)[]) {
00102 
00103         lib_handle result = NULL;
00104 
00105         int i;
00106         for (i=0; i< DRIVERS_MAX_LIBS; i++) {
00107                 if (0==strncmp(type_name, __loaded_libs[i].type_name)) {
00108                         result = __loaded_libs[i].h;
00109                 }
00110         }
00111 
00112         return result;
00113 }//
00114 
00115 
00116 /**
00117  * Adds a type to the list of loaded libs
00118  */
00119 void __drivers__add_lib(char (*type_name)[], lib_handle h) {
00120 
00121         int i, done=0;
00122         for (i=0; i< DRIVERS_MAX_LIBS; i++) {
00123                 if (NULL==__loaded_libs[i].h) {
00124                         __loaded_libs[i].h = h;
00125                         __loaded_libs[i].type_name = type_name;
00126                         done++;
00127                         break;
00128                 }
00129         }
00130         if (!done)
00131                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "drivers: could not add library");
00132 
00133 }//
